players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, watch out. I'm the detective and know your role."
You: "Bob, thanks for the info. Keep an eye on Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, keep investigating. Alice, stay cautious."
You: "Bob, thanks for the tip. Diana was killed last night, keep up the good work."
Bob: "Charlie, stay alert. I suspect you; Alice, be cautious."
Charlie: "Bob, keep going. Alice, consider the info and be careful."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Bob, thanks for the tip. Diana was killed last night, keep up the good work."
You: "Charlie, stay alert. I suspect you; Alice, be cautious."
Charlie: "Bob, keep going. Alice, consider the info and be careful."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
